sourcesContent:
import { View, Text, TouchableOpacity } from 'react-native';

export default function Login() {
  return (
    <View>
      <View className="">
        <Text>Logo here</Text>
      </View>

      <View className="flex flex-col items- justify-center">
        <Text className="text-lg text-center font-bold">Hey, Welcome</Text>
        <Text className="text-lg text-center font-semibold">
          We deliver on-demand organic fresh fruits from nearby stores
        </Text>
      </View>

      <View className="flex flex-col items-center justify-center">
        <View>
          <TouchableOpacity className="bg-yellow-200 rounded-lg shadow-2xl p-2">
            <Text>Get Started</Text>
          </TouchableOpacity>
        </View>
        <View>
          <TouchableOpacity className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-2xl p-2">
            <Text>I'm Client</Text>
          </TouchableOpacity>
        </View>
      </View>
    </View>
  );
}
